creator: BLUELINDEN
descriptionHtml:
If you would love to have a classic whiteboard around but there simply isn't one around, then this is the perfect app for you! That is why we started the Coach Tactical Board. This app was made exactly for you, and to make your life easier!


Features:
1. Create tactics/drills for your players.
2. Training module (use ball, cones, ladders and other objects to create exercises).
3. Drawing tools: 8 different types of lines (solid, dotted).
4. Save an unlimited number of tactics/drills.
5. Full, half, training & plain court mode.
6. Create Teams with your players.
7. Substitutions: drag & drop players to made changes in you squad.
8. Customize players: name, number, position and photo.
9. Use folders to group tactics/drills by type.
10. Export tactics/drills.
11. Customize your board: color, number of players etc.


Most of listed features are completely free, the rest of them are available in InApp purchase. Please note that with each app update users gets new features for free, join now!

If you have questions, suggestions, fell free to contact us:
Email: support@evlonsoft.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/CoachingAppsByBluelinden

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Copy training objects.
2. Change player shape (triangle, square, diamond).
3. Add more play details (coaching points, progressions).
4. Easy access to loaded play details ('Info' button).
5. New team colors.
6. Export animation crash fix.
